Sentencas: The Kansai Electric Power Co., Inc. (KEPCO) and Mitsubishi Materials Corporation (MMC) have been jointly developing disc-type intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs) since 2001.
Titulo: Development of disc-type intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Operation temperatures between 600 and 800 degrees C have been set as the target.
Titulo: Development of disc-type intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: These temperatures enable SOFCs to use inexpensive metallic separators for cell-stacking and are sufficiently high for steam reforming of the hydrocarbon fuel.
Titulo: Development of disc-type intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: A I kW-class demonstration power generation system with a module that had a steam-reforming function was developed in 2003.
Titulo: Development of disc-type intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The third generation module and the fourth generation module were developed in 2004.
Titulo: Development of disc-type intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The third generation module was integrated into the system for various tests including long-term stability.
Titulo: Development of disc-type intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The fourth generation module was examined for performance evaluation.
Titulo: Development of disc-type intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The system included an SOFC module, a dc-ac inverter, a desulfurizer, a heat-recovery unit, and an automatic control device.
Titulo: Development of disc-type intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The long-term stability test for over 1000 h gave no decrease in stack voltage.
Titulo: Development of disc-type intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In parallel, the long-term stability test of a single cell stack unit was continued for over 10,000 It.
Titulo: Development of disc-type intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In addition, hot water at 90 degrees C was obtained by the heat-recovery unit using high temperatures off-gas from the SOFC module.
Titulo: Development of disc-type intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The newly developed fourth generation module gave an electrical efficiency of 60% (dc/lower heating value) using town gas as a fuel at an average stack temperatures of about 750 degrees C. A 10 kW-class SOFC co-generation system has been under development in a New Energy and Industrial Technology Development Organization project since 2004.
Titulo: Development of disc-type intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell
